channel.title: Making 508 client HD compatible
channel.description:
Hi...
I recently decided to start a rsps project but this time I've upgraded to 508 servers. I would like to have my client, which I found as an IP changing client, to be able to switch between HD/LD. I've already found a server source that is compatible. I've even searched Google, This site, etc for hd clients but the ones I found were megaupload which is blocked.
I am assuming it wouldn't be too difficult to enable HD in my client? Where would I need to go in the client source files to enable HD? Thanks.
-Ghostly150

item.title: Making 508 client HD compatible
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
